meanings: (우연히, 뜻밖에) accidentally, by chance, by accident, somehow
(이따금) at times sometimes, occasionally, (every) once in a while, from time to time, (every) now and then,
가끔 occasionally, at times, now and then, once in a (long) while, on rare occasions.
우연히 accidentally, casually, unexpectedly, by (some) chance, by accident.

vlive.korean: 저... 어쩔 때는 영어이고 어쩔 때는 한국어요. I... Sometimes in English and sometimes in Korean. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 63
vlive.english: I... Sometimes in English and sometimes in Korean.

vlive.korean: 어쩔 수 없나요? Can nothing be done? 듣기 View video NCT : 준이준이런쥔이왔어요!✨
여기 조명이 어쩔 수... The light is a bit dim here. 듣기 View video TWICE : 뇽안 만랜오
vlive.english: The light is a bit dim here.

vlive.korean: 이미 뺐어요, 어쩔 수 없네요 - 나왔잖아 괜찮아? I took it out already. Sorry. - It's out. Is it okay? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.22
vlive.english: I took it out already. Sorry. - It's out. Is it okay?

vlive.korean: 지금 활동도 했으니까 어쩔 수 없지 않아? - 그런가? It's because we're promoting our new song. - Is it? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
vlive.english: It's because we're promoting our new song. - Is it?

examples.korean: He was forced to pander to her every whim. 발음듣기 그는 어쩔 수 없이 그녀의 모든 변덕을 다 들어주어야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was forced to pander to her every whim. 발음

examples.korean: The rebel soldiers were forced to surrender. 발음듣기 반란군들은 어쩔 수 없이 항복해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rebel soldiers were forced to surrender. 발음

examples.korean: She was forced to abdicate the throne of Spain. 발음듣기 그녀는 어쩔 수 없이 스페인 여왕 자리를 물러나야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was forced to abdicate the throne of Spain. 발음

examples.korean: We were overwhelmed by requests for information. 발음듣기 우리는 정보 요청들이 밀려와서 어쩔 줄을 몰랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were overwhelmed by requests for information. 발음

examples.korean: The beleaguered party leader was forced to resign. 발음듣기 사면초가에 몰린 당 대표는 어쩔 수 없이 사임을 해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The beleaguered party leader was forced to resign. 발음
